```{r}
library(rio)
library(readxl)

location="https://github.com/RSGriggs/543_proj/raw/main/"
file="activity.xls"
filelink=paste0(location,file)

ActivityData=import(filelink)
```
```{r}
summary(ActivityData)
```
```{r}
names(ActivityData)
```
```{r}
(DatingTimespent=table(ActivityData$type,ActivityData$dating))
```
```{r}
library(magrittr)
(DatTime=prop.table(DatingTimespent,
                            margin = 2)%>%round(.,2))
```
```{r}
DTP=as.data.frame(DatingTimespent)
names(DTP)=c("Location","Single","Dating")
```
```{r}
DTP$pctCol=as.data.frame(DatTime)[,3]
```
```{r}
head(DTP)
```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
basea=ggplot(data=DTP, 
             aes(x=Single, y=pctCol,
                 fill=Location))

Dodge1= basea +  geom_bar(stat="identity",
                            position ='dodge') 
Dodge1
```
